column3: What have you decided, what are you going to do?
Women's clothing is characterized by great diversity in styles and short production runs.
column4: Men's clothing typically has the most stylistic diversity unlike the blandness of women's fashion.

column3: Reports from two flight attendants in the coach cabin, Betty Ong and Madeline Amy Sweeney, tell us most of what we know about how the hijacking happened.
column4: The report on the hijacking was over five hundred pages long.

column3: At about 9:20, security personnel at FAA headquarters set up a hijacking teleconference with several agencies, including the Defense Department.
column4: The teleconference lasted for 13 straight hours.

column3: So we've got a couple of aircraft up there that have those instructions at this present time?
column4: At the present time, there weren't any aircraft in the air, right?
